description: Awarded to the project with the most well-thought-out and feasible business strategy. Judges will evaluate the potential for real-world implementation, scalability, and market impact.
Recognizes the project demonstrating exceptional technical innovation, complexity, and skill. This prize celebrates engineering excellence and cutting-edge technology.
Given to the project that makes the greatest positive impact on society. Judges will look for solutions addressing pressing social, environmental, or humanitarian challenges.
This prize is decided by participant votes and celebrates the most popular project among attendees. A great opportunity to showcase creativity and make an impression on the hackathon community.
